title: Free Grace
verses: The voice of free grace Cries, escape to the mountain, For
Adam's lost race,Christ has opened a fountain, For sin and transgres-
sion And eve-ry pol-lution,The blood it flows free-ly In
streams of sal-va-tion. The blood it flows free-ly In

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the free availability of salvation through Christ's blood
